spp.core

Class SPComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • spp.core.SPComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SPComponent
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A general-purpose, enhanced JComponent that serves as a container for the GraphicalComponent. Input handling and graphics can either be handled here, or by its individual components.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Used as an additional draw function, run prior to any of the components. Can be used for handing background graphics separate to any of its GraphicalComponents.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics instance

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
        Used as an additional mousePressed function, run prior to any of the components. Can be used for handing input separate to any of its GraphicalComponents.
        Parameters:
        event - the mouse event

      • mouseReleased

        public void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
        Used as an additional mouseReleased function, run prior to any of the components. Meant to be overridden, but not necessary.
        Parameters:
        event - the mouse event

      • denyComponents

        @Deprecated
public void denyComponents()
        Deprecated. 
        Used previously to forcibly prevent lower-layered graphical components from receiving any key or mouse press events. Deprecated to encourage usage of the new Hitbox system.
